ingredients: 3 cups soft peaches, or as needed, 3 cups soft nectarines, or as needed,   +   1/2 cup white sugar (Optional), 3 tablespoons cornstarch, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 6g 8%, Saturated Fat 5g 24%, Sodium 112mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 49g 18%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 34g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 24mg 119%, Calcium 54mg 4%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 351mg 7%
